TestCase.TestCaseTitle: The Producer service description (WSDL) is available from the URL provided in the MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The purpose is to validate a portion of the information in the MIP4 Joining Questionnaire by using the provided URL to retrieve the service description.This includes the WSDL itself and the WSDL/XML Schema imports and includes relating to the WSDL. Each of these artefacts shall be available for automated retrieval by the Consumer.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: After the exchange of MIP4 Joining Questionnaires, the service consumer shall verify the availability of the service description and validate its content.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: The producer's completed MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is completed when the producer's service description(WSDL) is acquired and validated at the location provided in the MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: Validation that the producer's service description (WSDL) is available, well-formed and valid.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The service consumer will acquire the URL to the service description (WSDL) of the provider's service from the previously provided MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The URL is acquired and well-formed according to the URL specifications.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The service consumer will retrieve the service description (WSDL) in its entirety by subsequently retrieving all referenced documents through import and include statements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The WSDL is retrieved in its entirety using the acquired URL.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The service consumer will validate the service description to ensure that it is well-formed and valid with respect to the XML Schema and WSDL specifications.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The WSDL is determined to be well-formed and valid.
